key.name: clone-directory
key.description: The default directory in which new repositories should be suggested to be cloned.

key.name: orientation
key.summary: Orientation of the main interface (vertical or horizontal)
key.description: Setting that sets the orientation of the main interface.

key.name: default-activity
key.description: The activity which gitg activates by default when first launched.

key.name: use-gravatar
key.description: Enable the use of gravatar to display user avatars.

key.name: enable-monitoring
key.description: Automatically update when external changes to .git are detected

key.name: enable-diff-highlighting
key.description: Setting that determines whether to enable syntax highlighting in diff views.

key.name: style-scheme
key.summary: Color scheme to use for syntax highlighting
key.description: Used by GtkSourceView to determine colors for syntax highlighting

key.name: collapse-inactive-lanes
key.description: Setting that indicates when an inactive lane should be collapsed. Valid values are 0 — 4, where 0 indicates “early” and 4 indicates “late”.

key.name: collapse-inactive-lanes-enabled
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to collapse history lanes which do not show activity. Enabling this can provide a cleaner history view when there is a lot of parallel development. See collapse-inactive-lanes to control when lanes should be collapsed.

key.name: topological-order
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to show the history in topological order.

key.name: show-stash
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to show items for the stash in the history.

key.name: show-staged
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to show a virtual item for the currently staged changes in the history.

key.name: show-unstaged
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to show a virtual item for the currently unstaged changes in the history.

key.name: mainline-head
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to always preserve a mainline in the history for the current HEAD.

key.name: default-selection
key.summary: Default selection of the history activity
key.description: Setting that determines the default selection on startup of the history activity.

key.name: reference-sort-order
key.description: The order by which references in the history sidebar should be sorted.

key.name: show-upstream-with-branch
key.description: Determines whether to also show the upstream (remote) tracking branch when selecting a local branch in the history view.

key.name: show-right-margin
key.summary: Show Right Margin in Commit Message View
key.description: Show a right margin indicator in the commit message view. This can be used to easily see where to break the commit message at a particular column.

key.name: right-margin-position
key.summary: Column at Which Right Margin is Shown
key.description: The column at which the right margin is shown if the show-right-margin preference is set to TRUE.

key.name: show-subject-margin
key.summary: Show Subject Margin in Commit Message View
key.description: Highlight the subject text of the commit message when it passes the margin specified by subject-margin-position.

key.name: subject-margin-position
key.summary: Column at Which Subject Margin is Shown
key.description: The column at which the subject margin is shown if the show-subject-margin preference is set to TRUE.

key.name: enable-spell-checking
key.description: Setting which determines whether or not spell checking is enabled when writing a commit message.

key.name: spell-checking-language
key.description: The language to use when spell checking is enabled for writing a commit message.

key.name: patience
key.summary: Use patience algorithm to show diffs
key.description: Setting to use patience algorithm to show diffs of a commit.

key.name: ignore-whitespace
key.description: Setting that indicates whether to ignore whitespace changes when showing the diff of a commit.

key.name: changes-inline
key.description: Setting that indicates whether changes within lines should be shown inline.

key.name: wrap
key.description: Wrap lines.

key.name: context-lines
key.description: Setting that determines how many lines of context (before and after) should be shown when showing the diff of a commit.

key.name: tab-width
key.summary: Rendered Width of a Tab Character
key.description: Setting that determines how much space a tab character should occupy when showing the diff of a commit.

key.name: context-lines
key.description: Setting that determines how many lines of context (before and after) should be shown when showing the diff to be staged/unstaged in the commit area.

key.name: tab-width
key.summary: Rendered Width of a Tab Character
key.description: Setting that determines how much space a tab character should occupy when showing the diff of a commit.
